document.full_text: at a rehearsal for "spider-man: turn off the dark" on friday, the actor christopher tierney returned to the scene of an accident that nearly killed him during a performance on dec. 20.
document.title: lots of drama, but no fall, during spider-man rehearsal
lines_and_colors: at a rehearsal for "spider-man: turn off the dark" on friday, the actor christopher tierney returned to the scene of an accident that nearly killed him during a performance on dec. 20.
